name: Kefi - A Lebanese Caf√© and Bistro and Bar

reviews.review_text: A beautiful spot to have your breakfast. Vibe with friends with mouth watering food alongside. Their Hummus platter is exotic and so is their jumjum rice. And craft beer is also available. All the Lebanese food I tried really blew my mind-away. It was so so so delicious. A hidden gem in Goa. Must visit spot.

I'm back to Mumbai, but I definitely miss Kefi and their breakfast. The atmosphere was charm and welcoming, and the preparation of eggs & coffee was just the way to start the day.

üç∞ It first got my attention when I saw they had Burnt Basque cake. Being Basque, I couldn't stop myself and had to try it. The cake was so yummy and smooth. It literally tasted like home.

‚òïÔ∏è coffees are a bliss. From the tiramisu coffee to the regular cold coffee, both options tasted intense and creamy at the same time.

üç≥ Lebanese eggs were the change-maker. I was afraid to try as there's a chilli on the menu stating that might be spicy but it was SO not spicy. Just the way I like it. I ordered twice in different days, and if I was still in Goa, I would have definitely started my day there.

üë•Ô∏è Staff were welcoming and professional.  They made sure you were comfortable without being intrusive. I recommend this place 100% to anyone visiting Goa. Even though you are not in a nearby area, try to make some time to visit if you are a foodie!

Goa has lot of new age cafe which serves global cuisine but this is my go out place for some high quality Mediterranean/middle estern food in goa. The vibe is pretty laid back at this place and some nice jazz really adds to that. I like the platter that they serve which is like a no brainer every-time i visit, and the coffee is also just perfect roast for my liking. We do give it a try to new dishes from their menu, sometimes it works out some times it doesn‚Äôt, like it didn‚Äôt work when I order ful mudammas. The pastry section has wide variety, tiramisu was decadent although bit pricey for the portion. On my suggestion, do give a try to muhammara which is rated as best dips in the world and kefi does it nicely.
